= Data Structure =

 # createMainStructure
  * "mainArr1 = createMainStructure(id, subData);"
  * Data Aspect.
   * Example of discrete data
    * Input: mainArr.cut = [A, C, B, D, C, B, A, D];
    * Result
     * mainArr.cut = [0, 2, 1, 3, 2, 1, 0, 3];
     * mainArr.cut.isDiscrete = "true";
     * mainArr.cut.index = [A, B, C, D]; (sorted index)
   * Example of continuous data
    * Input: mainArr.carat = [0.1, 0.45, ...];
    * Result
     * mainArr.carat = [0.1, 0.45, ...];
     * mainArr.carat.isDiscrete = undefined;
     * mainArr.carat.index = undefined;
  * Event Aspect.
   * not yet designed.
 # Axis
  * Issues
   * How do I set the mainLabel of axis? -> mainLabel is option, because there will be higher lever API which can provide mailLabel(CH's temporary idea)
   * Do I need to control font size of lable?
  * Example
   * Axis(dataObj, 'xLabel', 'yLabel', {legend: 'legendLabel', position: 'option', mainLabel:'option'});
 # ddply
  * ddply splits data frame like "ddply" in R.
  * Example
   * obj = ddply(dataObj, ['depth', 'price', 'cut'], color, {bin: option});
   * Return object
    * obj.depth, obj.price, obj.cut, obj.frequency.(all length of all fields is same)
 # Graphs
  * Example
   * Dot(dataObj, 'xLabel', 'yLabel', 'colorLable');
   * Bar(dataObj, 'xLabel', 'yLabel', 'colorLabel');
 # Color
   * "addColorField(labelObj)" adds "color" or "colorIndex" field into labelobj.
   * Called in Axis when checking legendLabel
   * Example
     * discrete: addColorField(mainArr1.cut);
     * result: mainArr1.cut.colorIndex = [RGB, RGB, ...];(length of mainArr1.cut.index)
     * continuous: addColorField(mainArr1.carat);
     * result: mainArr1.carat.color = [RGB, RGB, ...];(length of mainArr.carat)
